projects.name: TalaPrep
description: A platform for students to connect with tutors in their area.
Technologies: CSS3, HTML5, Javascript, jQuery, MySQL, PHP

projects.name: Redux Movie Brackets
description: Vote on pairs of movies currently in theatres to decide on a movie to watch.
Technologies: CSS3, HTML5, Javascript, Node.js, React.js, Redux, Socket.io
projects.description1: An application that lets groups of users vote on movies currently in theatres in a tournament-style fashion.

projects.name: React Chattr
description: Instant messaging application with usernames and timestamps
Technologies: CSS3, Express.js, HTML5, Javascript, React.js, Socket.io
projects.description1: A chat application that supports the standard features found in common chat applications, enabling user avatars, names and message timestamps.

projects.name: Dashboard
description: A dashboard that manages adding, editing and deleting user data.
Technologies: CSS3, HTML5, Javascript, React.js, React-Router, React-Bootstrap
projects.description1: A user management system that keeps track of user data and supports adding, editing and removing users.

projects.name: TicTacToe+
description: A Google-inspired Tic Tac Toe game with a built in AI player that uses the minimax algorithm.
projects.description1: A Google-inspired TicTacToe game, with a built in AI that utilizes the minimax algorithm.

projects.name: Pomodoro
description: Productivity tool that tracks the duration of break and work periods.
projects.description1: A productivity application that helps users track their break and work periods, with adjustable settings for each timer.
